@popculturereference - There’s two different kinds of NTR.

The most commonly used being netorare simply being cuckold, some other man or woman stealing the main’s character’s partner which doesn’t apply here.

Lesser known being netori, also it's specifically used to identify with the one being stolen from and identifying with the one doing the stealing. Example being Mari being taken away from Takishi from her brother.

To sum it up, a major aspect in an NTR is the lost of something valuable and precious from one side.

If he was truly an alpha, he would’ve fucked up all his senpai’s up. Like he said if anything were to happen to him per se, those senpai’s would be fucked. Can’t say anything for Mari tho except she’s a basic bitch at this point. Lastly that fucking face at page 36 tho, fucking priceless. The way this is going tho is spiraling towards disaster at this point, this is a shitty NTR IMO.
